txt.en: The obelisks surrounding the lever illuminate. Gears grind to the south as a gate opens.
'This is not the end of me!'
The obelisks darken and the levers fall back into place.
'You have only begun to witness my true powers!'
'To me!'
'Who dares to call me forth before it is time? Who has betrayed my orders?'
'It seems we have visitors. Protect yourselves! Gather your minions!'
'Fool! I told you to leave! You have what you came for. Now be gone!'
'Enough of this foolery! I will not stand for this anymore. My power is that of death itself. You cannot dream of defeating me.'
[placeholder]'s focus has been broken! He begins to attack wildly!
'Oh no! They're coming right at us! Help! Help!'
'We will meet again, my foes!'
'You are not welcome in Helegrod! This land now belongs to Angmar.'
'Come closer. Allow me to show you what it is I can do. Come, [placeholder].'
'I am ashamed that you have defeated my men. Perhaps it is time I repay the favour!'
'Now it is time to show them my true power!'
'I control the beasts before you! It is they who will end your pitiful lives!'
'I don't think so! You will not get past me!'
[placeholder] begins to focus all his attacks on [placeholder]!
'To me, pet! Together we will show them the power of Angmar!'
The obelisks surrounding the lever illuminate. Gears grind to the north as a gate opens.
'RÃªmgoj, Praunk-goj, your defence is your own!'
'Please, sir, do not squash me. I need protection! They are after me!'
Gears grind to the west as the gate to deeper beneath the mountain opens.
'Welcome, intruders. You will come no further. Let us see how well you equip yourself.'
Hi!
'Well done. Perhaps that was too easy a test.'
The lever falls into place. The obelisks surrounding it illuminate.
'Interesting. You are tougher than I thought. You will not stop this, though.'
'Help! Help! Bad little people!'
'This does not bode well! Silk-spinners, to me! Destroy them!'
'To me, spider-queen! Together we will destroy these weak-willed fools!'
'Burzgost, Burzdyr, your defence is your own!'
'You have made it far, friends. You picked the wrong path to venture down. This hall will be your tomb!'
